Package andesite

Interface NodeState

public interface NodeState
Provides access to andesite objects for plugins.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.stream.Stream<? extends AndesitePlayer> allPlayers()
    Stream containing all existing players, for all users and guilds.
    AudioHandler audioHandler()
    The audio handler used by the node.
    com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayerManager audioPlayerManager()
    The regular player manager, which returns opus data.
    java.lang.ref.Cleaner cleaner()
    Cleaner used to register actions on garbage collection of objects.
    com.typesafe.config.Config config()
    Config instance used by the node.
    EventDispatcher dispatcher()
    The event dispatcher used by the node.
    AndesitePlayer getExistingPlayer​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String guildId)
    Returns the existing player for the provided user and guild, or null if it doesn't exist.
    AndesitePlayer getPlayer​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String guildId)
    Gets or creates a player for the provided user and guild.
    com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayerManager pcmAudioPlayerManager()
    The PCM player manager, which returns pcm data.
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​? extends AndesitePlayer> playerMap​(java.lang.String userId)
    Returns a map of the players owned by the provided user.
    AndesitePlayer removePlayer​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String guildId)
    Removes and stops the player for the provided user and guild, returning it.
    AndesiteRequestHandler requestHandler()
    The request handler used by the node.
    Vertx vertx()
    Vertx instance used by the node.

  • Method Details

    • config

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue com.typesafe.config.Config config()
      Config instance used by the node. Plugins should read configurations from this object, which loads from the appropriate sources.
      Returns:
      The node configuration.

    • vertx

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue Vertx vertx()
      Vertx instance used by the node.
      Returns:
      The vertx instance.

    • requestHandler

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue AndesiteRequestHandler requestHandler()
      The request handler used by the node.
      Returns:
      The request handler.

    • audioPlayerManager

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayerManager audioPlayerManager()
      The regular player manager, which returns opus data.
      Returns:
      The regular player manager.

    • pcmAudioPlayerManager

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayerManager pcmAudioPlayerManager()
      The PCM player manager, which returns pcm data. Used by the track mixer for better performance.
      Returns:
      The PCM player manager.

    • dispatcher

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue EventDispatcher dispatcher()
      The event dispatcher used by the node. You can use this to dynamically register/unregister listeners.
      Returns:
      The event dispatcher.

    • audioHandler

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue AudioHandler audioHandler()
      The audio handler used by the node. Allows lower level configuration of the player.
      Returns:
      The audio handler.

    • playerMap

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​? extends AndesitePlayer> playerMap​(@Nonnull java.lang.String userId)
      Returns a map of the players owned by the provided user. This map is thread safe and will be updated when players are created/destroyed.
      Parameters:
      userId - User id that owns the map.
      Returns:
      The map of guild id -> player for the provided user.
      See Also:
      AndesitePlayer

    • getPlayer

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue AndesitePlayer getPlayer​(@Nonnull java.lang.String userId, @Nonnull java.lang.String guildId)
      Gets or creates a player for the provided user and guild. Equivalent to playerMap(userId).computeIfAbsent(guildId, createPlayer);.
      Parameters:
      userId - User id for the player.
      guildId - Guild id for the player.
      Returns:
      The current player, if it exists, or a new player.
      See Also:
      AndesitePlayer

    • getExistingPlayer

      @Nullable @CheckReturnValue AndesitePlayer getExistingPlayer​(@Nonnull java.lang.String userId, @Nonnull java.lang.String guildId)
      Returns the existing player for the provided user and guild, or null if it doesn't exist. Equivalent to playerMap(userId).get(guildId).
      Parameters:
      userId - User id for the player.
      guildId - Guild id for the player.
      Returns:
      The current player.
      See Also:
      AndesitePlayer

    • removePlayer

      @Nullable AndesitePlayer removePlayer​(@Nonnull java.lang.String userId, @Nonnull java.lang.String guildId)
      Removes and stops the player for the provided user and guild, returning it. Returns null if there was no player.
      Parameters:
      userId - User id for the player.
      guildId - Guild id for the player.
      Returns:
      The removed player.
      See Also:
      AndesitePlayer

    • allPlayers

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue java.util.stream.Stream<? extends AndesitePlayer> allPlayers()
      Stream containing all existing players, for all users and guilds.
      Returns:
      All existing players.
      See Also:
      AndesitePlayer

    • cleaner

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue java.lang.ref.Cleaner cleaner()
      Cleaner used to register actions on garbage collection of objects. Plugins should use this cleaner instead of creating their own.
      Returns:
      The cleaner instance for the node.
      See Also:
      Cleaner
